name: cornichon
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a very small cucumber (= a long green vegetable, usually eaten raw) that has been pickled (= preserved in vinegar) and usually flavoured with tarragon (= a herb): I love the terrine and all the accessories you get with it: mustard, a little cornichon, a little salad, a little toast. It is the acid that produces that pleasurable shudder when you bite into a cornichon.
kajakiki/E+/GettyImages
